name: Out of the Cube DEMO
description:
Out of the Cube is a brain-inciting platform-puzzle game where your goal is to collect all coins and get to the other side of the map to get to a portal. Simple, isn't it!? No, it's not!

You'll have to think in ways to place Cubes and shoot them to activate their effects and get to it. But, if you like challenge, try to beat the game with less cubes.

The game have a total of 25 stages, and you can choose between two game difficulties, casual, in which you can place as many Cubes as you want, or advanced, in which you will have a limit to the Cubes.

The game will have a lot of exciting achievements that you can try and collect.

If you think you are up to the challenge, join us and think Out of The Cube.

YOU CAN BUY THE FULL VERSION ON STEAM.
